ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides an interactive tutorial for learning prompt engineering with Anthropic's Claude AI model. It offers a structured course with lessons, exercises, and a playground to practice writing and troubleshooting prompts. The tutorial covers basic prompt structure, common failure modes, and advanced techniques to help users build effective prompts for various use cases.
